body: Look, I don't have a problem with NTR, you wanna read it, read it, but for fucks sake, can you at least TRY and make the story SOMEWHAT believable? The dude shows the girl a single photo of her boyfriend HOLDING SOMETHING, and suddenly she's just a-ok with him fucking her for two weeks. NTR is one thing, Absolute shit tier writing is another. Between that and the half assed "omigosh I'm SOOOOOOO sorry honey" ending, I'm gonna assume this is some weird self insert shit.
OMG he got a picture of the bf picking something of a shelf, what do I do!? Oh let's become his sex slave for two weeks cause why not?
Not bad.. but not great either..
Artists skills aren’t bad but he is one of the laziest story tellers ever
Nice. The fucker done a great job taming that uptight bitch
The Boyfriend is a pussy ass weakling
The "boyfriend" reaction to just simply walk away is what irked me the most, followed by the lame attempt by the artist to show that she has some form of feelings for him still.
